AR 13. The policy may take the form of a stand-alone policy regarding value chain workers or be
included in a broader document such as a code of ethics or a general sustainability policy
that has already been disclosed by the undertaking as part of another ESRS. In those cases,
the undertaking shall provide an accurate cross-reference to identify the aspects of the policy
that satisfy the requirements of this Disclosure Requirement.
